description.zh: linuxserver/freshrss 是一个基于 FreshRSS 的自托管 RSS 源聚合器 Docker 镜像。它允许用户轻松搭建和管理自己的 RSS 阅读器，支持多种架构。容器包含持久化配置、环境变量自定义以及与外部数据库集成等功能。
description.en: The linuxserver/freshrss Docker image provides a self-hosted RSS feed aggregator based on FreshRSS. It allows users to easily set up and manage their own RSS feed reader with support for multiple architectures. The container includes features like persistent configuration, environment variable customization, and integration with external databases.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量高效的自托管 RSS 源聚合方案
- 支持多架构，兼容性更强
- 通过环境变量和卷映射轻松集成到现有基础设施
- 来自 LinuxServer.io 团队的定期更新和安全补丁

## 功能列表:

- 基于 Web 的配置向导，简化初始化设置
- 支持外部 MySQL/MariaDB 数据库
- 可通过 extensions 目录添加自定义扩展
- 支持使用 Docker Compose 或 CLI 部署
- 通过卷映射实现配置持久化
- 时区和用户/组 ID 自定义
- 支持通过 FILE__ 前缀从文件设置环境变量（Docker Secrets）
- 支持 umask 自定义以控制文件权限
- 提供用于扩展功能的 Docker Mods
- 完整的日志记录和容器管理命令
- 版本化镜像更新，附带清晰的更新日志
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and efficient self-hosted RSS feed solution
- Multi-architecture support for broader compatibility
- Easy integration with existing infrastructure through environment variables and volume mapping
- Regular updates and security patches from the LinuxServer.io team

## Features:

- Web-based setup wizard for easy configuration
- Support for external MySQL/MariaDB databases
- Ability to add custom extensions via the extensions directory
- Docker Compose and CLI deployment options
- Persistent configuration via volume mapping
- Timezone and user/group ID customization
- Support for Docker secrets via FILE__ environment variables
- Umask customization for file permissions
- Available Docker Mods for extended functionality
- Detailed logging and container management commands
- Versioned image updates with clear changelog
